$interpreted: Naya: Don't you worry, Angelia. As soon as we're out of the city, we'll be able to meet up with Dylan.
Angelia: Mm...
Naya: Isn't that what's got you all worried?
Angelia: ...I'm just thinking about what Miss Adelaide said. I've worn the red cloak, sat on the throne, too...
Angelia: But... I've never really felt—that this was my fate.
Angelia: ...Maybe I'm just not cut out for this? In the end, there's nothing I can do which my uncle isn't capable of...
Naya: Angelia...
Sharice: Your Highness, my soldiers are waiting. We should go...
Angelia: Ah, I'm sorry, I've almost made us late.
Angelia: But... I apologize, Sharice. I've got you mixed up in this, too...
Sharice: Th-that's okay. I'm only responsible for escorting you from the palace, Your Highness. It's nothing at all!
Naya: Since we're supposedly visiting to pay our condolences, the Twelve Nobles all believe we only have Sharice escorting us.
Naya: Just wait until they find out we've got Dylan and the royal guard with us. By then it'll be too late.
???: I wouldn't be so sure of that.
Angelia: Hyde?!
Naya: You! How dare you let me catch sight of you!
Hyde: Don't be so cold. We were partners, once~
Naya: You must be joking! We were just pawns in your little game!
Hyde: And I was a pawn in yours. You played me, didn't you, Your Highness? And now you're pretending to be innocent. Is that fair?
Angelia: I didn't think you were the type to enjoy reminiscing over times past.
Hyde: Heh~ You're even more cutting than I remember~
Hyde: Such a shame. You almost escaped the palace—before I happened to catch you.
Sharice: Wh-wh-what do you mean?! We're not...
Serafin Head: You've disappointed us, Your Highness. Guards! Take Her Highness back.
Naya: Dammit, there's too many of them...
Naya: How could you? You, one of the Twelve Noble Houses, colluding with the Dracontines?!
Serafin Head: What can I say? Things never go quite how you want them to.
Angelia: If I know my uncle, he'd never join foces with the Dracontines... Were you planning to control the Kingdom from the shadows?
Hyde: You've come far, Your Highness, but you're still asking foolish questions.
Hyde: We weren't "planning" anything. We've been in control all along. We pull the strings, and the Carlos family all dance like puppets!
Sharice: Shut it, you noisy louse!
Sharice: Bandits like you are less than dirt! Take this!
Sharice: Owowowow...
Angelia: Forget it, Sharice, just get out of here! Warn Dylan, tell him to escape and return with reinforcements!
Sharice: But...
Angelia: There's no time! Just go!!
Sharice: Yes, Ma'am! We'll be back for you, Your Highness, just hold on!
Sharice: Get out of here!
Hyde: Don't let her escape!
Dylan: (What's taking them so long...)
Wounded Soldier: Gwagh!
Panicking Soldier: Incoming, General!
Dylan: (That uniform... Those are Serafin troops!)
Dylan: (Dammit! We've been rumbled... What about the Queen?!)
Dylan: Stay calm, and follow my orders. We're going to fight!
Panicking Soldier: No way, Captain! They're just stalling us for time while the City Guard close up the gates!
Dylan: What?! Stop them! We have to go back for the Queen—
Sharice: It's impossible, Captain!
Dylan: Sharice! What are you doing here by yourself? Where's the Queen?!
Sharice: Our operation was intercepted. The Queen and Naya... were captured. Her Highness sent me to tell you not to fight, but to find some way to come back with reinforcements...
